Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Globales Acis & Galatea in Madrid, you'll be connected to the airport and convenient to Centro Comercial Campo de las Naciones and Madrid Congress Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Juan Carlos I Park and IFEMA Convention Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 25 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and lunch, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast and lunch, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Globales Acis & Galatea in Madrid, you'll be connected to the airport and convenient to Centro Comercial Campo de las Naciones and Madrid Congress Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Juan Carlos I Park and IFEMA Convention Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Centro Comercial Campo de las Naciones - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Juan Carlos I Park - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
IFEMA Convention Center - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Madrid Congress Centre - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Olivar de la Hinojosa Golf Club - 1.7 km / 1 mi
El Capricho Park - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Estadio de la Comunidad - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Plenilunio Shopping Area - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Alcala Norte - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Real Madrid City - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Arturo Soria Plaza Shopping Center - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Las Ventas - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Parque de Berlin - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Torrespana - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
National Auditorium of Music - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi

The preferred airport for Globales Acis & Galatea is Madrid (MAD-Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas) - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Hotel Madrid Barajas Acis y Galatea is Madrid (MAD-Barajas) - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi.
